setUserBorrowLimits(address,address,uint.details: This function can only be called by team multisig

params.baseLimit_: The base limit for the user borrow. Set to 0 to keep current value.
params.maxLimit_: The max limit for the user borrow. Set to 0 to keep current value.
params.token_: The address of the token for which to set the user borrow limit
params.user_: The address of the user for which to set the user borrow limit

params.baseLimit_: The base limit for the user supply. Set to 0 to keep current value.
params.skipMaxPercentChangeCheck_: allow full range of limit check. Keep to false by default to have additional human error check.
params.token_: The address of the token for which to set the user withdraw limit
params.user_: The address of the user for which to set the user withdraw limit

setWithdrawalLimit(address,address,uint2.details: This function can only be called by team multisig

params.newLimit_: The new withdrawal limit to be set
params.token_: The address of the token for which to set the withdrawal limit
params.user_: The address of the user for which to set the withdrawal limit

LogSetUserBorrowLimits(address,address,u.notice: emitted when multisig changes the borrow limit config

LogSetUserWithdrawLimit(address,address,.notice: emitted when multisig changes the withdrawal limit config

LogSetWithdrawalLimit(address,address,ui.notice: emitted when multisig successfully changes the withdrawal limit

TEAM_MULTISIG().notice: Team multisigs allowed to trigger methods

getUserBorrowConfig(address,address).notice: Returns the user borrow config for a given user and token.

getUserSupplyConfig(address,address).notice: Returns the user supply config for a given user and token.

setUserBorrowLimits(address,address,uint.notice: Sets the user borrow limits for a specific token of a user, with time and max percent change restrictions.         Can only be called by team multisig.

setUserWithdrawLimit(address,address,uin.notice: sets withdraw base limit without restrictions. Can only be called by team multisig.

setWithdrawalLimit(address,address,uint2.notice: Sets the withdrawal limit for a specific token of a user in the liquidity
